cases.title: Marketing Expert Witness Testimony Allowed
cases.description: Plaintiff's Marketing Expert Witness was allowed to testify regarding likelihood of confusion regarding the design of a coffee maker.

cases.title: Business Valuation Expert Witness Testifies in Management Services Contract Matter
cases.description: The court ruled a Business Valuation Expert Witness could testify on damages issues despite relying primarily on financial records of non-parties.

cases.title: US District Court Limits the Testimony of Forensic Accounting Expert
cases.description: The US District Court (Southern District) allowed one Forensic Accounting Expert Witness to testify, but limited another in a claim over non-payment of overtime wages.
